Foundational Philosophy.quote: Yoga is the cessation of the fluctuations of the mind. (Patanjali, Yoga Sutras 1.2)

Asanas (Postures).quote: Sthira sukham āsanam: Postures should be steady and comfortable. (Yoga Sutras 2.46)

Pranayama (Breath).quote: Regulate inhalation, retention, exhalation: Nadi Shodhana (alternate nostril breathing).

Hatha Yoga.quote: Balance sun (ha) and moon (tha) energies: Surya Namaskar (sun salutation) → 12-step flow.

Vinyasa Flow.quote: Movement synchronized with breath: Chaturanga → Urdhva Mukha Svanasana → Adho Mukha Svanasana.

Meditation (Dhyana).quote: Witness consciousness: Observe thoughts like clouds passing in the sky (Vipassana).

Chakras.quote: Muladhara (root) → Sahasrara (crown): Energy centers aligned via visualization/mantras.

Kundalini Yoga.quote: Awaken coiled energy: Sat Kriya (rapid breath + mantra "Sat Nam").

Iyengar Yoga.quote: Alignment precision: Props (blocks, straps) for Trikonasana (triangle pose) symmetry.

Yoga Nidra.quote: Yogic sleep: Guided body scan → Delta wave relaxation (90min ≈ 4hrs sleep).

Bhakti Yoga.quote: Devotional practice: Kirtan (chanting) → Om Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya.

Jnana Yoga.quote: Self-inquiry: "Who am I?" (Ramana Maharshi) to transcend ego (ahamkara).

Ayurveda Integration.quote: Dosha balance: Vata (air), Pitta (fire), Kapha (earth) → Tailor practice to constitution.

Bandhas (Locks).quote: Mula Bandha (root lock) + Uddiyana Bandha (abdominal lift) → Direct prana (energy).

Mudras.quote: Gesture science: Gyan Mudra (thumb + index) → Enhances focus and wisdom.

Yoga Therapy.quote: Ease chronic pain: Cat-Cow (Marjaryasana-Bitilasana) for spinal mobility.

Modern Adaptations.quote: Aerial yoga: Silk hammocks → Zero-gravity inversions (Sarvangasana).

Yoga Ethics.quote: Avoid cultural appropriation: Honor roots in Sanskrit texts (e.g., Rig Veda).

Prenatal Yoga.quote: Pelvic floor focus: Malasana (squat) + Pranayama for labor preparation.

Yoga Sutras.quote: Kaivalya (liberation): Detach from prakriti (material world) through abhyasa (practice).

Tantra Yoga.quote: Sacred embodiment: Rituals to honor Shiva/Shakti duality → Union of opposites.

Yoga Anatomy.quote: Biomechanics: Rotator cuff engagement in Adho Mukha Vrksasana (handstand).

Yoga & Science.quote: Vagus nerve stimulation: Ujjayi breath → Parasympathetic activation (rest/digest).

Yoga History.quote: Vedic origins (~1500 BCE) → Patanjali’s codification (~400 CE) → Global dissemination.

Yoga for Athletes.quote: Recovery flows: Yin yoga targets fascia (hold poses 3-5 mins).

Yoga Philosophy.quote: Karma Yoga: Selfless action. Bhagavad Gita 2.47: "You have the right to work, but not the fruits."

Advanced Asanas.quote: Arm balances: Bakasana (crow) → Pincha Mayurasana (peacock feather) → Core + breath control.

Yoga & Ecology.quote: Bhumi (Earth) reverence: Practice ahimsa through eco-conscious living (reduce waste).
